This quotation is presented to the customer above on the date created, and is valid until the quotation expiry date. All prices quoted were correct at the time of quotation creation, and are subject to change due to supply. Any questions regarding your quotation, please speak with your representative. To accept this quotation, in whole or in part, please reply to the sender with your wishes, specifying a valid purchase order number, where possible.
Thank you for your business. It is very much appreciated.

E&OE. All Sales Final. Interest Charges on Past Due Accounts and Collection Costs. Customer shall reimburse all costs and expenses for legal or administrative fees incurred in collecting any amounts past due. All resale will be invoiced upon successful delivery to client's designated delivery point. If any amendments are made to vendor promotions or pricing during this period, this quotation becomes void. ETAs are subject to change. Onsite visits cancelled with less than 48 hours notice will be subject to a fee equivalent to 50% of the cost of the scheduled time. By signing this quote you indicate your acceptance of the above Costs in accordance with our Standard Terms and Conditions.
